title: PokeFusion Attention: Enhancing Reference-Free Style-Conditioned Generation
comment: 7 pages, 5 figures. Under review at IJCNN 2026
summary: This paper studies reference-free style-conditioned character generation in text-to-image diffusion models, where high-quality synthesis requires both stable character structure and consistent, fine-grained style expression across diverse prompts. Existing approaches primarily rely on text-only prompting, which is often under-specified for visual style and tends to produce noticeable style drift and geometric inconsistency, or introduce reference-based adapters that depend on external images at inference time, increasing architectural complexity and limiting deployment flexibility.We propose PokeFusion Attention, a lightweight decoder-level cross-attention mechanism that fuses textual semantics with learned style embeddings directly inside the diffusion decoder. By decoupling text and style conditioning at the attention level, our method enables effective reference-free stylized generation while keeping the pretrained diffusion backbone fully frozen.PokeFusion Attention trains only decoder cross-attention layers together with a compact style projection module, resulting in a parameter-efficient and plug-and-play control component that can be easily integrated into existing diffusion pipelines and transferred across different backbones.Experiments on a stylized character generation benchmark (Pokemon-style) demonstrate that our method consistently improves style fidelity, semantic alignment, and character shape consistency compared with representative adapter-based baselines, while maintaining low parameter overhead and inference-time simplicity.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为PokeFusion Attention的新型轻量级交叉注意力机制，用于在文本到图像扩散模型中实现无参考、风格可控的角色生成。该方法通过将文本语义与学习到的风格嵌入直接融合在扩散解码器内，有效解决了现有方法在风格一致性和几何结构稳定性方面的问题，同时保持了预训练扩散模型的冻结，并显著减少了参数开销和推理复杂度。
AI.motivation: 现有文本到图像扩散模型在生成具有特定视觉风格的角色时，文本提示往往不足以精确表达视觉风格，容易导致风格漂移和几何不一致。而基于参考图像的方法则增加了推理时的复杂性和部署限制。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为PokeFusion Attention的轻量级解码器层交叉注意力机制。该机制直接在扩散解码器内融合文本语义和学习到的风格嵌入，将文本和风格的条件解耦。仅训练解码器的交叉注意力层和一个紧凑的风格投影模块，并保持预训练扩散主干模型冻结。
AI.result: 在Pokemon风格的角色生成基准测试中，PokeFusion Attention在风格保真度、语义对齐和角色形状一致性方面，均优于现有的基于适配器的基线方法。同时，该方法参数开销低，推理时简单高效。
AI.conclusion: PokeFusion Attention是一种参数高效、即插即用的控制组件，能够有效实现无参考的风格化生成，并能轻松集成到现有扩散模型中，且可迁移至不同模型。它解决了文本提示不足和参考图像依赖的问题，显著提升了生成图像的质量和一致性。

title: Self-Verification Dilemma: Experience-Driven Suppression of Overused Checking in LLM Reasoning
summary: Large Reasoning Models (LRMs) achieve strong performance by generating long reasoning traces with reflection. Through a large-scale empirical analysis, we find that a substantial fraction of reflective steps consist of self-verification (recheck) that repeatedly confirm intermediate results. These rechecks occur frequently across models and benchmarks, yet the vast majority are confirmatory rather than corrective, rarely identifying errors and altering reasoning outcomes. This reveals a mismatch between how often self-verification is activated and how often it is actually useful. Motivated by this, we propose a novel, experience-driven test-time framework that reduces the overused verification. Our method detects the activation of recheck behavior, consults an offline experience pool of past verification outcomes, and estimates whether a recheck is likely unnecessary via efficient retrieval. When historical experience suggests unnecessary, a suppression signal redirects the model to proceed. Across multiple model and benchmarks, our approach reduces token usage up to 20.3% while maintaining the accuracy, and in some datasets even yields accuracy improvements.

AI.tldr: 研究发现大型推理模型（LRMs）中的自我验证（recheck）步骤冗余且低效，提出了一种基于经验的测试时框架，通过检索历史经验来预测并抑制不必要的验证，从而在保持准确性的同时减少了20.3%的token使用量。
AI.motivation: 大型推理模型（LRMs）中的自我验证步骤（recheck）在实际应用中被过度使用，但大多数情况下并不能纠正错误，显示出实际效用与使用频率之间存在不匹配。
AI.method: 提出了一种在测试时运行的、基于经验的框架。该框架能检测到recheck行为的激活，并查询一个包含过往验证结果的离线经验池。通过高效检索，框架可以估算recheck是否不必要，如果历史经验表明不必要，则会发送一个抑制信号，引导模型跳过该验证步骤。
AI.result: 在多个模型和基准测试中，提出的方法可以将token使用量减少高达20.3%，同时保持了原有的准确性。在某些数据集上，准确性甚至有所提高。
AI.conclusion: 通过识别并减少大型推理模型中低效的自我验证步骤，可以在不牺牲性能的情况下显著提高模型的效率，证明了经验驱动的测试时优化策略的有效性。

title: Conformal Reachability for Safe Control in Unknown Environments
summary: Designing provably safe control is a core problem in trustworthy autonomy. However, most prior work in this regard assumes either that the system dynamics are known or deterministic, or that the state and action space are finite, significantly limiting application scope. We address this limitation by developing a probabilistic verification framework for unknown dynamical systems which combines conformal prediction with reachability analysis. In particular, we use conformal prediction to obtain valid uncertainty intervals for the unknown dynamics at each time step, with reachability then verifying whether safety is maintained within the conformal uncertainty bounds. Next, we develop an algorithmic approach for training control policies that optimize nominal reward while also maximizing the planning horizon with sound probabilistic safety guarantees. We evaluate the proposed approach in seven safe control settings spanning four domains -- cartpole, lane following, drone control, and safe navigation -- for both affine and nonlinear safety specifications. Our experiments show that the policies we learn achieve the strongest provable safety guarantees while still maintaining high average reward.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种结合保形预测和可达性分析的概率验证框架，用于未知动力学系统的安全控制，并开发了一种能优化奖励和规划时域的控制策略训练算法，在多种安全控制场景下验证了其安全性和有效性。
AI.motivation: 现有可验证安全控制方法在系统动力学未知或状态动作空间有限的情况下存在局限性，本研究旨在解决这一问题，为更广泛的未知动力学系统提供安全控制。
AI.method: 该研究结合了保形预测（Conformal Prediction）和可达性分析（Reachability Analysis）。首先，使用保形预测为未知动力学在每个时间步获取有效的区间估计（不确定性区间）。然后，利用可达性分析在保形不确定性范围内验证系统安全性。最后，开发一种算法来训练控制策略，该策略在优化标称奖励的同时，还能最大化规划时域并提供概率安全保证。
AI.result: 在七个安全控制场景（包括倒立摆、车道跟随、无人机控制和安全导航）和仿射/非线性安全规范下进行了评估。结果表明，所提出的方法能够实现最强的可证明安全性保证，同时保持较高的平均奖励。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功开发了一个适用于未知动力学系统的概率验证框架，并提出了相应的控制策略训练算法。该方法在保证安全性的同时，还能有效地优化控制性能，为可信自主性领域的研究提供了新的方向。

title: Memora: A Harmonic Memory Representation Balancing Abstraction and Specificity
summary: Agent memory systems must accommodate continuously growing information while supporting efficient, context-aware retrieval for downstream tasks. Abstraction is essential for scaling agent memory, yet it often comes at the cost of specificity, obscuring the fine-grained details required for effective reasoning. We introduce Memora, a harmonic memory representation that structurally balances abstraction and specificity. Memora organizes information via its primary abstractions that index concrete memory values and consolidate related updates into unified memory entries, while cue anchors expand retrieval access across diverse aspects of the memory and connect related memories. Building on this structure, we employ a retrieval policy that actively exploits these memory connections to retrieve relevant information beyond direct semantic similarity. Theoretically, we show that standard Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Knowledge Graph (KG)-based memory systems emerge as special cases of our framework. Empirically, Memora establishes a new state-of-the-art on the LoCoMo and LongMemEval benchmarks, demonstrating better retrieval relevance and reasoning effectiveness as memory scales.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 Memora 的新颖记忆表示方法，它通过结构化地平衡抽象和具体性来解决智能体记忆系统中信息爆炸和检索效率的问题，并在多个基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的智能体记忆系统在处理不断增长的信息时面临效率挑战，而抽象化虽然有助于扩展，但会牺牲细节，影响有效推理。因此，需要一种能够同时保持抽象性和特异性的记忆表示方法。
AI.method: Memora 采用一种“谐波记忆表示”来组织信息。它使用主要的抽象索引具体的记忆值，并将相关的更新整合到统一的记忆条目中。同时，“线索锚点”扩展了检索范围，连接了不同的记忆方面和相关的记忆。在此基础上，采用了一种主动利用这些记忆连接的检索策略，以超越直接语义相似性来检索信息。
AI.result: Memora 在 LoCoMo 和 LongMemEval 基准测试中设定了新的最先进水平，在记忆规模增长时，展现了更好的检索相关性和推理有效性。理论上，该框架可以包含标准的检索增强生成（RAG）和知识图（KG）记忆系统作为其特例。
AI.conclusion: Memora 成功地在抽象性和特异性之间找到了平衡，能够有效地处理大规模记忆，提高检索相关性和推理能力，并为未来的智能体记忆系统研究提供了新的方向。

title: Spiral RoPE: Rotate Your Rotary Positional Embeddings in the 2D Plane
summary: Rotary Position Embedding (RoPE) is the de facto positional encoding in large language models due to its ability to encode relative positions and support length extrapolation. When adapted to vision transformers, the standard axial formulation decomposes two-dimensional spatial positions into horizontal and vertical components, implicitly restricting positional encoding to axis-aligned directions. We identify this directional constraint as a fundamental limitation of the standard axial 2D RoPE, which hinders the modeling of oblique spatial relationships that naturally exist in natural images. To overcome this limitation, we propose Spiral RoPE, a simple yet effective extension that enables multi-directional positional encoding by partitioning embedding channels into multiple groups associated with uniformly distributed directions. Each group is rotated according to the projection of the patch position onto its corresponding direction, allowing spatial relationships to be encoded beyond the horizontal and vertical axes. Across a wide range of vision tasks including classification, segmentation, and generation, Spiral RoPE consistently improves performance. Qualitative analysis of attention maps further show that Spiral RoPE exhibits more concentrated activations on semantically relevant objects and better respects local object boundaries, highlighting the importance of multi-directional positional encoding in vision transformers.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 Spiral RoPE 的新型二维位置编码方法，用于解决视觉 Transformer 中标准轴向 RoPE 仅能编码轴对齐方向位置信息的局限性，从而提升模型在各种视觉任务上的性能。
AI.motivation: 标准轴向二维 RoPE 在视觉 Transformer 中存在内在的限制，即它只能有效地编码轴对齐方向（水平和垂直）的位置信息，而无法捕捉到自然图像中普遍存在的斜向空间关系。这种限制阻碍了模型对图像中斜向空间关系的建模能力。
AI.method: Spiral RoPE 通过将位置编码通道划分为多个组，并为每个组关联一个均匀分布的方向来实现多方向位置编码。每个通道组的旋转角度由图像块位置在该方向上的投影决定，从而使得模型能够编码超越水平和垂直轴的空间关系。
AI.result: 在图像分类、分割和生成等多种视觉任务上，Spiral RoPE 均取得了性能上的提升。此外，可视化注意力图显示 Spiral RoPE 能够更集中地激活与语义相关的目标，并更好地遵循局部物体边界。
AI.conclusion: Spiral RoPE 是一种简单有效的扩展，通过实现多方向位置编码，克服了标准轴向二维 RoPE 的局限性，显著提升了视觉 Transformer 在各种下游任务上的性能，并能生成更具解释性的注意力图。

title: Learning to Reason Faithfully through Step-Level Faithfulness Maximization
summary: Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR) has markedly improved the performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) on tasks requiring multi-step reasoning. However, most RLVR pipelines rely on sparse outcome-based rewards, providing little supervision over intermediate steps and thus encouraging over-confidence and spurious reasoning, which in turn increases hallucinations. To address this, we propose FaithRL, a general reinforcement learning framework that directly optimizes reasoning faithfulness. We formalize a faithfulness-maximization objective and theoretically show that optimizing it mitigates over-confidence. To instantiate this objective, we introduce a geometric reward design and a faithfulness-aware advantage modulation mechanism that assigns step-level credit by penalizing unsupported steps while preserving valid partial derivations. Across diverse backbones and benchmarks, FaithRL consistently reduces hallucination rates while maintaining (and often improving) answer correctness. Further analysis confirms that FaithRL increases step-wise reasoning faithfulness and generalizes robustly. Our code is available at https://github.com/aintdoin/FaithRL.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为FaithRL的强化学习框架，通过优化推理的忠实度来减少大型语言模型的幻觉，同时保持或提高答案的正确性。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于奖励的强化学习方法（RLVR）在多步推理任务中表现良好，但其稀疏的基于结果的奖励会导致模型对中间步骤过度自信并产生虚假推理，从而增加幻觉。为了解决这个问题，需要一种可以直接优化推理忠实度的框架。
AI.method: FaithRL框架通过正式化一个最大化忠实度的目标函数，并理论证明其可以减轻过度自信。具体实现上，引入了几何奖励设计和忠实度感知优势调制机制，通过惩罚不支持的中间步骤来分配步骤级信用，同时保留有效的中间推导。
AI.result: 在不同的基础模型和基准测试中，FaithRL consistently 降低了幻觉率，并且保持（或提高了）答案的正确性。进一步的分析证实，FaithRL 提高了推理的忠实度，并且泛化能力强。
AI.conclusion: FaithRL 是一种有效的强化学习框架，能够通过直接优化推理忠实度来显著减少大型语言模型的幻觉，并保持甚至提高推理任务的性能。该方法在减少幻觉、提高中间推理步骤的可靠性以及泛化能力方面均表现出优越性。

title: CRL-VLA: Continual Vision-Language-Action Learning
summary: Lifelong learning is critical for embodied agents in open-world environments, where reinforcement learning fine-tuning has emerged as an important paradigm to enable Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models to master dexterous manipulation through environmental interaction. Thus, Continual Reinforcement Learning (CRL) is a promising pathway for deploying VLA models in lifelong robotic scenarios, yet balancing stability (retaining old skills) and plasticity (learning new ones) remains a formidable challenge for existing methods. We introduce CRL-VLA, a framework for continual post-training of VLA models with rigorous theoretical bounds. We derive a unified performance bound linking the stability-plasticity trade-off to goal-conditioned advantage magnitude, scaled by policy divergence. CRL-VLA resolves this dilemma via asymmetric regulation: constraining advantage magnitudes on prior tasks while enabling controlled growth on new tasks. This is realized through a simple but effective dual-critic architecture with novel Goal-Conditioned Value Formulation (GCVF), where a frozen critic anchors semantic consistency and a trainable estimator drives adaptation. Experiments on the LIBERO benchmark demonstrate that CRL-VLA effectively harmonizes these conflicting objectives, outperforming baselines in both anti-forgetting and forward adaptation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 CRL-VLA 的框架，用于持续强化学习（CRL）中的视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型，以解决在开放世界环境中机器人实现终身学习时，稳定性和可塑性之间的权衡难题。通过一种新的双判别器架构和目标条件价值函数（GCVF），CRL-VLA 在保持旧技能的同时，还能有效地学习新技能。
AI.motivation: 在开放世界环境中，具身智能体需要不断学习新技能以适应环境变化，而现有的强化学习微调方法在 VLA 模型上存在稳定性和可塑性难以平衡的问题，阻碍了其在机器人领域中的终身学习应用。
AI.method: 提出 CRL-VLA 框架，通过推导一个将稳定-可塑性权衡与目标条件优势幅度及策略散度联系起来的统一性能界限。该框架采用非对称正则化，通过一个具有新颖 GCVF 的双判别器架构实现：一个冻结的判别器保持语义一致性，一个可训练的判别器驱动适应性。
AI.result: 在 LIBERO 基准测试中，CRL-VLA 在对抗遗忘和前向适应方面均优于现有基线方法，成功地平衡了稳定性和可塑性这两个相互冲突的目标。
AI.conclusion: CRL-VLA 框架为解决 VLA 模型在持续强化学习中的稳定-可塑性权衡问题提供了一种有效且理论有据的解决方案，为机器人在动态环境中实现终身学习铺平了道路。

title: MentalSeek-Dx: Towards Progressive Hypothetico-Deductive Reasoning for Real-world Psychiatric Diagnosis
summary: Mental health disorders represent a burgeoning global public health challenge. While Large Language Models (LLMs) have demonstrated potential in psychiatric assessment, their clinical utility is severely constrained by benchmarks that lack ecological validity and fine-grained diagnostic supervision. To bridge this gap, we introduce \textbf{MentalDx Bench}, the first benchmark dedicated to disorder-level psychiatric diagnosis within real-world clinical settings. Comprising 712 de-identified electronic health records annotated by board-certified psychiatrists under ICD-11 guidelines, the benchmark covers 76 disorders across 16 diagnostic categories. Evaluation of 18 LLMs reveals a critical \textit{paradigm misalignment}: strong performance at coarse diagnostic categorization contrasts with systematic failure at disorder-level diagnosis, underscoring a gap between pattern-based modeling and clinical hypothetico-deductive reasoning. In response, we propose \textbf{MentalSeek-Dx}, a medical-specialized LLM trained to internalize this clinical reasoning process through supervised trajectory construction and curriculum-based reinforcement learning. Experiments on MentalDx Bench demonstrate that MentalSeek-Dx achieves state-of-the-art (SOTA) performance with only 14B parameters, establishing a clinically grounded framework for reliable psychiatric diagnosis.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了MentalDx Bench，一个用于真实临床环境中精神障碍诊断的基准测试，并在此基础上开发了MentalSeek-Dx，一个专门针对医学的大型语言模型，在参数量相对较小的情况下取得了最先进的诊断性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型（LLMs）在精神评估方面有潜力，但其临床效用受限于缺乏生态效度的基准测试和细粒度诊断监督。研究旨在弥合这一差距，为真实临床环境下的精神障碍诊断提供一个可靠的评估框架和模型。
AI.method: 研究者构建了一个名为MentalDx Bench的基准测试，包含712份由精神科医生根据ICD-11指南标注的电子健康记录，涵盖76种精神障碍。他们评估了18个LLMs在MentalDx Bench上的表现，并提出了一个名为MentalSeek-Dx的医学专业LLM，该模型通过监督轨迹构建和基于课程的强化学习来内化临床推理过程。
AI.result: 评估发现，现有LLMs存在“范式错位”：在粗略的诊断分类上表现良好，但在细粒度的障碍级别诊断上系统性地失败。MentalSeek-Dx在MentalDx Bench上取得了最先进（SOTA）的性能，尽管其参数量仅为140亿。
AI.conclusion: MentalDx Bench为精神障碍诊断提供了一个临床导向的基准。MentalSeek-Dx通过模仿临床推理过程，证明了即使在参数量相对较小的情况下，也能实现可靠的精神疾病诊断，为开发更具临床实用性的LLM模型奠定了基础。

title: EventFlash: Towards Efficient MLLMs for Event-Based Vision
summary: Event-based multimodal large language models (MLLMs) enable robust perception in high-speed and low-light scenarios, addressing key limitations of frame-based MLLMs. However, current event-based MLLMs often rely on dense image-like processing paradigms, overlooking the spatiotemporal sparsity of event streams and resulting in high computational cost. In this paper, we propose EventFlash, a novel and efficient MLLM to explore spatiotemporal token sparsification for reducing data redundancy and accelerating inference. Technically, we build EventMind, a large-scale and scene-diverse dataset with over 500k instruction sets, providing both short and long event stream sequences to support our curriculum training strategy. We then present an adaptive temporal window aggregation module for efficient temporal sampling, which adaptively compresses temporal tokens while retaining key temporal cues. Finally, a sparse density-guided attention module is designed to improve spatial token efficiency by selecting informative regions and suppressing empty or sparse areas. Experimental results show that EventFlash achieves a $12.4\times$ throughput improvement over the baseline (EventFlash-Zero) while maintaining comparable performance. It supports long-range event stream processing with up to 1,000 bins, significantly outperforming the 5-bin limit of EventGPT. We believe EventFlash serves as an efficient foundation model for event-based vision.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为EventFlash的高效事件驱动多模态大语言模型（MLLM），通过时空稀疏化技术显著提高了吞吐量，同时保持了性能，并能处理更长的事件流。
AI.motivation: 现有的事件驱动MLLM在处理稀疏的时空事件流时计算成本过高，主要由于它们沿用了密集图像的处理范式，未能有效利用事件数据的稀疏性。
AI.method: 研究提出了EventMind数据集（包含超过50万条指令和各种长度的事件流），并设计了两个关键模块：1. 自适应时间窗口聚合模块，用于高效时间采样并压缩时序token；2. 稀疏密度引导注意力模块，用于选择性关注有信息量的空间区域。模型采用课程学习策略进行训练。
AI.result: EventFlash的吞吐量比基线模型（EventFlash-Zero）提高了12.4倍，同时性能相当。它能够处理长达1000个bin的事件流，远超EventGPT的5个bin限制。
AI.conclusion: EventFlash通过时空稀疏化技术，成功构建了一个高效的事件驱动MLLM，解决了计算成本高的问题，并能够处理更长的事件序列，为事件驱动视觉领域奠定了基础模型。

title: Building Interpretable Models for Moral Decision-Making
comment: 8 pages, 4 figures, accepted to AAAI'26 Machine Ethics Workshop
summary: We build a custom transformer model to study how neural networks make moral decisions on trolley-style dilemmas. The model processes structured scenarios using embeddings that encode who is affected, how many people, and which outcome they belong to. Our 2-layer architecture achieves 77% accuracy on Moral Machine data while remaining small enough for detailed analysis. We use different interpretability techniques to uncover how moral reasoning distributes across the network, demonstrating that biases localize to distinct computational stages among other findings.

AI.tldr: 研究人员构建了一个定制的 Transformer 模型，用于分析神经网络在有轨电车难题等道德困境中的决策过程。模型通过嵌入编码情境信息，并使用解释性技术揭示了其道德推理机制及其存在的偏见。
AI.motivation: 研究人员希望理解神经网络如何做出道德决策，特别是其在类似有轨电车难题的场景下的推理过程，并探究其内部机制和潜在偏见。
AI.method: 构建了一个定制的两层 Transformer 模型，使用嵌入向量编码情境信息（受影响者、数量、结果），并在 Moral Machine 数据集上进行训练和评估，同时应用了多种可解释性技术。
AI.result: 该模型在 Moral Machine 数据集上达到了 77% 的准确率，并且模型规模较小，便于深入分析。通过解释性技术，研究人员发现模型的道德推理分布在不同的计算阶段，并且偏见也集中在特定的计算阶段。
AI.conclusion: 定制的 Transformer 模型能够有效模拟神经网络在道德决策中的行为，并且通过解释性技术，可以揭示模型内部的道德推理机制和偏见分布，为理解和改进 AI 的道德决策能力提供了见解。

title: QVLA: Not All Channels Are Equal in Vision-Language-Action Model's Quantization
summary: The advent of Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models represents a significant leap for embodied intelligence, yet their immense computational demands critically hinder deployment on resource-constrained robotic platforms. Intuitively, low-bit quantization is a prevalent and preferred technique for large-scale model compression. However, we find that a systematic analysis of VLA model's quantization is fundamentally lacking. We argue that naively applying uniform-bit quantization from Large Language Models (LLMs) to robotics is flawed, as these methods prioritize passive data fidelity while ignoring how minor action deviations compound into catastrophic task failures. To bridge this gap, we introduce QVLA, the first action-centric quantization framework specifically designed for embodied control. In a sharp departure from the rigid, uniform-bit quantization of LLM-based methods, QVLA introduces a highly granular, channel-wise bit allocation strategy. Its core mechanism is to directly measure the final action-space sensitivity when quantizing each individual channel to various bit-widths. This process yields a precise, per-channel importance metric that guides a global optimization, which elegantly unifies quantization and pruning (0-bit) into a single, cohesive framework. Extensive evaluations on different baselines demonstrate the superiority of our approach. In the LIBERO, the quantization version of OpenVLA-OFT with our method requires only 29.2% of the original model's VRAM while maintaining 98.9% of its original performance and achieving a 1.49x speedup. This translates to a 22.6% performance improvement over the LLM-derived method SmoothQuant. Our work establishes a new, principled foundation for compressing VLA models in robotics, paving the way for deploying powerful, large-scale models on real-world hardware. Code will be released.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了QVLA，一个针对具身智能体的视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型的量化框架，通过通道级精细化比特分配，有效降低模型计算需求，同时保持高精度和性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的VLA模型计算量巨大，难以部署在资源受限的机器人平台上。现有模型压缩技术（如低比特量化）在VLA模型上应用效果不佳，因为它们忽视了动作偏差累积导致的灾难性任务失败。
AI.method: QVLA采用动作导向的量化策略，通过测量每个通道在不同比特宽度下的动作空间敏感度，为每个通道分配最优比特数。该框架将量化和剪枝（0比特）统一在一个全局优化框架中。
AI.result: 在LIBERO基准测试中，采用QVLA量化的模型仅占用原始模型29.2%的VRAM，性能保持98.9%，速度提升1.49倍。相比LLM衍生的SmoothQuant方法，QVLA性能提升22.6%。
AI.conclusion: QVLA是第一个专门为具身控制设计的面向动作的量化框架，为VLA模型的机器人部署提供了新的基础，显著降低了计算成本，同时保证了模型性能。

title: SEAD: Self-Evolving Agent for Multi-Turn Service Dialogue
summary: Large Language Models have demonstrated remarkable capabilities in open-domain dialogues. However, current methods exhibit suboptimal performance in service dialogues, as they rely on noisy, low-quality human conversation data. This limitation arises from data scarcity and the difficulty of simulating authentic, goal-oriented user behaviors. To address these issues, we propose SEAD (Self-Evolving Agent for Service Dialogue), a framework that enables agents to learn effective strategies without large-scale human annotations. SEAD decouples user modeling into two components: a Profile Controller that generates diverse user states to manage training curriculum, and a User Role-play Model that focuses on realistic role-playing. This design ensures the environment provides adaptive training scenarios rather than acting as an unfair adversary. Experiments demonstrate that SEAD significantly outperforms Open-source Foundation Models and Closed-source Commercial Models, improving task completion rate by 17.6% and dialogue efficiency by 11.1%. Code is available at: https://github.com/Da1yuqin/SEAD.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为SEAD（Self-Evolving Agent for Service Dialogue）的框架，用于提升大型语言模型在服务对话中的表现，通过解耦用户建模和自适应训练，无需大量人工标注即可有效学习策略，实验结果表明其在任务完成率和对话效率上显著优于现有模型。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型在开放领域对话中表现出色，但在服务对话方面性能不佳，主要原因是依赖低质量的人类对话数据，且数据稀缺，难以模拟真实的、目标导向的用户行为。
AI.method: 提出SEAD框架，将用户建模解耦为两个部分：1. Profile Controller：生成多样化的用户状态，以管理训练课程。2. User Role-play Model：专注于实现逼真的角色扮演。这种设计确保了训练环境提供自适应的训练场景，而非不公平的对手。
AI.result: SEAD在实验中显著优于开源基础模型和闭源商业模型，任务完成率提高了17.6%，对话效率提高了11.1%。
AI.conclusion: SEAD框架能够使服务对话代理在没有大规模人工标注的情况下，有效学习策略，显著提升服务对话的表现，解决了当前模型在服务对话中的局限性。

title: InstaDrive: Instance-Aware Driving World Models for Realistic and Consistent Video Generation
summary: Autonomous driving relies on robust models trained on high-quality, large-scale multi-view driving videos. While world models offer a cost-effective solution for generating realistic driving videos, they struggle to maintain instance-level temporal consistency and spatial geometric fidelity. To address these challenges, we propose InstaDrive, a novel framework that enhances driving video realism through two key advancements: (1) Instance Flow Guider, which extracts and propagates instance features across frames to enforce temporal consistency, preserving instance identity over time. (2) Spatial Geometric Aligner, which improves spatial reasoning, ensures precise instance positioning, and explicitly models occlusion hierarchies. By incorporating these instance-aware mechanisms, InstaDrive achieves state-of-the-art video generation quality and enhances downstream autonomous driving tasks on the nuScenes dataset. Additionally, we utilize CARLA's autopilot to procedurally and stochastically simulate rare but safety-critical driving scenarios across diverse maps and regions, enabling rigorous safety evaluation for autonomous systems. Our project page is https://shanpoyang654.github.io/InstaDrive/page.html.

AI.tldr: InstaDrive是一个新的框架，通过引入实例流引导器和空间几何对齐器来提高生成驾驶视频的真实性，解决了现有世界模型在实例级时间一致性和空间几何保真度方面的不足，并在nuScenes数据集上取得了最先进的视频生成质量，同时增强了下游自动驾驶任务的表现。
AI.motivation: 现有用于训练自动驾驶模型的世界模型在生成驾驶视频时，难以保持实例级别的时间一致性和空间几何保真度，这限制了其生成真实驾驶视频的能力。
AI.method: 提出InstaDrive框架，包含两个核心组件：1. 实例流引导器（Instance Flow Guider），用于提取并跨帧传播实例特征，强制执行时间一致性并保持实例身份。2. 空间几何对齐器（Spatial Geometric Aligner），用于提升空间推理能力，确保实例的精确位置，并显式地建模遮挡层级。此外，利用CARLA的自动驾驶系统生成罕见但安全关键的驾驶场景。
AI.result: InstaDrive在nuScenes数据集上实现了最先进的视频生成质量，并提升了下游自动驾驶任务的表现。通过程序化和随机模拟，能够生成多样的安全关键驾驶场景。
AI.conclusion: InstaDrive通过实例感知机制显著提高了生成驾驶视频的真实性，解决了世界模型在时间和空间上的不足，并为自动驾驶系统的安全评估提供了更有效的解决方案。

title: GFlowPO: Generative Flow Network as a Language Model Prompt Optimizer
summary: Finding effective prompts for language models (LMs) is critical yet notoriously difficult: the prompt space is combinatorially large, rewards are sparse due to expensive target-LM evaluation. Yet, existing RL-based prompt optimizers often rely on on-policy updates and a meta-prompt sampled from a fixed distribution, leading to poor sample efficiency. We propose GFlowPO, a probabilistic prompt optimization framework that casts prompt search as a posterior inference problem over latent prompts regularized by a meta-prompted reference-LM prior. In the first step, we fine-tune a lightweight prompt-LM with an off-policy Generative Flow Network (GFlowNet) objective, using a replay-based training policy that reuses past prompt evaluations to enable sample-efficient exploration. In the second step, we introduce Dynamic Memory Update (DMU), a training-free mechanism that updates the meta-prompt by injecting both (i) diverse prompts from a replay buffer and (ii) top-performing prompts from a small priority queue, thereby progressively concentrating the search process on high-reward regions. Across few-shot text classification, instruction induction benchmarks, and question answering tasks, GFlowPO consistently outperforms recent discrete prompt optimization baselines.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 GFlowPO 的概率性提示优化框架，通过结合 GFlowNet 和动态记忆更新（DMU）机制，提高了语言模型提示搜索的样本效率和效果，并在多项 NLP 任务上优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 现有基于强化学习的提示优化方法样本效率低，常依赖于在固定分布中采样的元提示和在策略更新，限制了其探索能力。因此，需要一种更高效的提示优化方法。
AI.method: GFlowPO 框架分为两步：1. 使用重放（replay-based）的离策略（off-policy）生成式流网络（GFlowNet）目标，对轻量级提示语言模型进行微调，以提高样本效率；2. 引入训练免费（training-free）的动态记忆更新（DMU）机制，通过注入多样化提示和高性能提示来更新元提示，从而聚焦于高回报区域。
AI.result: 在少样本文本分类、指令归纳和问答任务上，GFlowPO 持续优于最近的离散提示优化基线方法。
AI.conclusion: GFlowPO 是一种有效的概率性提示优化框架，通过改进样本效率和搜索策略，显著提升了在各种 NLP 任务中的提示性能。

title: Can Large Language Models Generalize Procedures Across Representations?
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are trained and tested extensively on symbolic representations such as code and graphs, yet real-world user tasks are often specified in natural language. To what extent can LLMs generalize across these representations? Here, we approach this question by studying isomorphic tasks involving procedures represented in code, graphs, and natural language (e.g., scheduling steps in planning). We find that training LLMs with popular post-training methods on graphs or code data alone does not reliably generalize to corresponding natural language tasks, while training solely on natural language can lead to inefficient performance gains. To address this gap, we propose a two-stage data curriculum that first trains on symbolic, then natural language data. The curriculum substantially improves model performance across model families and tasks. Remarkably, a 1.5B Qwen model trained by our method can closely match zero-shot GPT-4o in naturalistic planning. Finally, our analysis suggests that successful cross-representation generalization can be interpreted as a form of generative analogy, which our curriculum effectively encourages.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，大型语言模型（LLMs）在符号表示（代码、图）和自然语言任务之间泛化能力不足。文章提出了一个两阶段的数据课程（先符号后自然语言），显著提高了模型在不同表示下的性能，并将其成功归因于模型泛化能力的提升。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型在符号表示（如代码和图）上进行了大量训练和测试，但实际用户任务通常用自然语言表述。研究旨在探究 LLMs 在这些不同表示之间泛化能力的程度，并解决其局限性。
AI.method: 研究者通过构建涉及代码、图和自然语言的同构任务（例如，规划中的调度步骤），来评估 LLMs 的泛化能力。他们尝试了流行的后训练方法，并提出了一种两阶段的数据课程：首先在符号数据上训练，然后是自然语言数据。他们还分析了跨表示泛化的机制，并将其解释为生成类比。
AI.result: 单独在图或代码数据上进行后训练，并不能可靠地泛化到相应的自然语言任务。仅在自然语言上训练会导致效率不高的性能提升。所提出的两阶段数据课程显著提高了模型在不同模型家族和任务上的性能。使用该方法训练的一个 1.5B Qwen 模型在自然语言规划任务上，性能接近零样本的 GPT-4o。
AI.conclusion: 通过两阶段的数据课程，可以有效提升 LLMs 在代码、图和自然语言表示之间的泛化能力。这种成功可以被理解为模型学会了生成类比，而课程设计能够有效地促进这一点。该方法在提高模型性能方面具有显著效果，甚至能让小型模型在某些任务上接近大型模型。

title: Assessing the Impact of Typological Features on Multilingual Machine Translation in the Age of Large Language Models
summary: Despite major advances in multilingual modeling, large quality disparities persist across languages. Besides the obvious impact of uneven training resources, typological properties have also been proposed to determine the intrinsic difficulty of modeling a language. The existing evidence, however, is mostly based on small monolingual language models or bilingual translation models trained from scratch. We expand on this line of work by analyzing two large pre-trained multilingual translation models, NLLB-200 and Tower+, which are state-of-the-art representatives of encoder-decoder and decoder-only machine translation, respectively. Based on a broad set of languages, we find that target language typology drives translation quality of both models, even after controlling for more trivial factors, such as data resourcedness and writing script. Additionally, languages with certain typological properties benefit more from a wider search of the output space, suggesting that such languages could profit from alternative decoding strategies beyond the standard left-to-right beam search. To facilitate further research in this area, we release a set of fine-grained typological properties for 212 languages of the FLORES+ MT evaluation benchmark.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，除了训练资源不均外，语言的类型学特征也是影响多语言模型翻译质量的重要因素，尤其是在大型预训练模型中。某些类型学特征的语言可能更适合采用非标准的解码策略。
AI.motivation: 现有研究多基于小型模型或从头训练的双语模型，未能充分了解大型预训练多语言模型中语言类型学对翻译质量的影响。因此，本研究旨在分析两个最先进的大型预训练多语言翻译模型（NLLB-200 和 Tower+），以更全面地理解语言类型学的作用。
AI.method: 分析了两个大型预训练多语言翻译模型（NLLB-200 和 Tower+）在广泛语言上的翻译质量。通过控制数据资源和书写脚本等因素，研究语言类型学特征与翻译质量之间的关系，并探索了输出空间搜索范围对不同类型学语言的影响。
AI.result: 研究表明，目标语言的类型学特征会驱动翻译质量，即使在控制了数据资源和书写脚本等因素后也是如此。此外，某些类型学特征的语言在更广泛的输出空间搜索中获益更多。
AI.conclusion: 语言类型学是影响大型多语言模型翻译质量的关键因素。对于某些类型学特征的语言，可能需要采用超越标准左到右的束搜索（beam search）的替代解码策略来提高翻译效果。研究还发布了FLORES+ MT评估基准中212种语言的详细类型学特征，以促进未来研究。

title: Risk Awareness Injection: Calibrating Vision-Language Models for Safety without Compromising Utility
summary: Vision language models (VLMs) extend the reasoning capabilities of large language models (LLMs) to cross-modal settings, yet remain highly vulnerable to multimodal jailbreak attacks. Existing defenses predominantly rely on safety fine-tuning or aggressive token manipulations, incurring substantial training costs or significantly degrading utility. Recent research shows that LLMs inherently recognize unsafe content in text, and the incorporation of visual inputs in VLMs frequently dilutes risk-related signals. Motivated by this, we propose Risk Awareness Injection (RAI), a lightweight and training-free framework for safety calibration that restores LLM-like risk recognition by amplifying unsafe signals in VLMs. Specifically, RAI constructs an Unsafe Prototype Subspace from language embeddings and performs targeted modulation on selected high-risk visual tokens, explicitly activating safety-critical signals within the cross-modal feature space. This modulation restores the model's LLM-like ability to detect unsafe content from visual inputs, while preserving the semantic integrity of original tokens for cross-modal reasoning. Extensive experiments across multiple jailbreak and utility benchmarks demonstrate that RAI substantially reduces attack success rate without compromising task performance.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为RAI（Risk Awareness Injection）的轻量级、无需训练的框架，用于增强视觉语言模型（VLMs）对多模态越狱攻击的安全性，通过注入风险感知能力，在不牺牲模型效用的前提下有效降低攻击成功率。
AI.motivation: 现有的VLMs容易受到多模态越狱攻击，而现有的防御方法（如安全微调、令牌操作）要么成本高昂，要么会显著降低模型效用。研究发现LLMs本身能够识别不安全内容，而视觉输入的加入会稀释风险信号。因此，研究的动机是恢复VLMs的风险识别能力。
AI.method: RAI框架通过构建一个“不安全原型子空间”（Unsafe Prototype Subspace）来恢复LLM的风险识别能力。该框架首先从语言嵌入中提取不安全原型，然后对选定的高风险视觉令牌进行有针对性的调制，从而激活跨模态特征空间中的安全关键信号。这种调制恢复了模型从视觉输入检测不安全内容的能力，同时保持了原始令牌的语义完整性。
AI.result: RAI框架在多个越狱攻击和效用基准测试中表现出色，显著降低了攻击成功率，同时没有损害模型的任务性能。
AI.conclusion: RAI是一种有效的、无需训练的框架，能够恢复VLMs的风险感知能力，从而抵御多模态越狱攻击，并且不会对模型的效用产生负面影响。

title: LaVPR: Benchmarking Language and Vision for Place Recognition
summary: Visual Place Recognition (VPR) often fails under extreme environmental changes and perceptual aliasing. Furthermore, standard systems cannot perform "blind" localization from verbal descriptions alone, a capability needed for applications such as emergency response. To address these challenges, we introduce LaVPR, a large-scale benchmark that extends existing VPR datasets with over 650,000 rich natural-language descriptions. Using LaVPR, we investigate two paradigms: Multi-Modal Fusion for enhanced robustness and Cross-Modal Retrieval for language-based localization. Our results show that language descriptions yield consistent gains in visually degraded conditions, with the most significant impact on smaller backbones. Notably, adding language allows compact models to rival the performance of much larger vision-only architectures. For cross-modal retrieval, we establish a baseline using Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) and Multi-Similarity loss, which substantially outperforms standard contrastive methods across vision-language models. Ultimately, LaVPR enables a new class of localization systems that are both resilient to real-world stochasticity and practical for resource-constrained deployment. Our dataset and code are available at https://github.com/oferidan1/LaVPR.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 LaVPR 的大规模基准，通过引入大量自然语言描述来增强现有的视觉地点识别 (VPR) 数据集，旨在提高 VPR 在极端环境变化和感知混淆下的鲁棒性，并实现仅凭语言描述进行盲定位。研究探讨了多模态融合和跨模态检索两种范式，发现语言描述能有效提升 VPR 性能，尤其是在视觉退化和小型模型上，并为跨模态检索建立了新的基线。LaVPR 支持开发更具弹性和资源效率的定位系统。
AI.motivation: 现有的视觉地点识别（VPR）系统在面对极端环境变化和感知混淆时表现不佳，并且无法仅凭语言描述进行“盲”定位，这限制了其在紧急响应等场景的应用。因此，需要一个能够增强 VPR 鲁棒性并支持语言驱动定位的新数据集和方法。
AI.method: 本文提出了 LaVPR 基准，该基准在现有 VPR 数据集上增加了超过 65 万条自然语言描述。研究了两种 VPR 范式：1）多模态融合，通过结合视觉和语言信息来提高鲁棒性；2）跨模态检索，允许仅使用语言描述进行定位。在跨模态检索方面，使用了低秩适应（LoRA）和多相似性损失来建立基线。
AI.result: 研究表明，语言描述在视觉退化条件下提供了显著的性能提升，对小型骨干网络的影响尤为显著。通过添加语言信息，紧凑型模型可以媲美大型纯视觉架构的性能。在跨模态检索任务中，基于 LoRA 和多相似性损失的基线方法显著优于标准的对比学习方法。
AI.conclusion: LaVPR 基准为 VPR 领域引入了大规模的语言描述，为开发对现实世界变化更具弹性且适用于资源受限环境的新一代定位系统提供了支持。语言信息能够有效增强 VPR 的鲁棒性，并实现语言驱动的定位能力。

title: Global Geometry Is Not Enough for Vision Representations
summary: A common assumption in representation learning is that globally well-distributed embeddings support robust and generalizable representations. This focus has shaped both training objectives and evaluation protocols, implicitly treating global geometry as a proxy for representational competence. While global geometry effectively encodes which elements are present, it is often insensitive to how they are composed. We investigate this limitation by testing the ability of geometric metrics to predict compositional binding across 21 vision encoders. We find that standard geometry-based statistics exhibit near-zero correlation with compositional binding. In contrast, functional sensitivity, as measured by the input-output Jacobian, reliably tracks this capability. We further provide an analytic account showing that this disparity arises from objective design, as existing losses explicitly constrain embedding geometry but leave the local input-output mapping unconstrained. These results suggest that global embedding geometry captures only a partial view of representational competence and establish functional sensitivity as a critical complementary axis for modeling composite structure.

AI.tldr: 全局嵌入几何并不能有效预测组合绑定能力，而基于输入-输出雅可比矩阵的功能敏感性则能可靠地衡量这一能力。现有损失函数仅约束嵌入几何，未约束局部输入-输出映射，这解释了这种差异。
AI.motivation: 现有表示学习方法通常假设全局分布良好的嵌入能够支持鲁棒和可泛化的表示，并以此为导向设计训练目标和评估方法。然而，这种全局几何信息对于编码元素间的组合关系（组合绑定）是敏感度不足的。
AI.method: 作者通过在21个视觉编码器上测试几何度量预测组合绑定能力，并计算输入-输出雅可比矩阵来衡量功能敏感性，然后比较两者与组合绑定能力的相关性。此外，还对损失函数的设计进行了理论分析。
AI.result: 标准的几何统计度量与组合绑定能力几乎没有相关性（接近于零）。相反，功能敏感性（通过输入-输出雅可比矩阵衡量）能够可靠地跟踪组合绑定能力。理论分析表明，这种差异源于现有损失函数仅约束嵌入的全局几何，而忽略了局部输入-输出映射。
AI.conclusion: 全局嵌入几何只捕捉了表示能力的部分信息，而功能敏感性是理解和建模复合结构的关键补充维度。未来的表示学习研究应同时关注全局几何和局部功能敏感性。

title: HySparse: A Hybrid Sparse Attention Architecture with Oracle Token Selection and KV Cache Sharing
summary: This work introduces Hybrid Sparse Attention (HySparse), a new architecture that interleaves each full attention layer with several sparse attention layers. While conceptually simple, HySparse strategically derives each sparse layer's token selection and KV caches directly from the preceding full attention layer. This architecture resolves two fundamental limitations of prior sparse attention methods. First, conventional approaches typically rely on additional proxies to predict token importance, introducing extra complexity and potentially suboptimal performance. In contrast, HySparse uses the full attention layer as a precise oracle to identify important tokens. Second, existing sparse attention designs often reduce computation without saving KV cache. HySparse enables sparse attention layers to reuse the full attention KV cache, thereby reducing both computation and memory. We evaluate HySparse on both 7B dense and 80B MoE models. Across all settings, HySparse consistently outperforms both full attention and hybrid SWA baselines. Notably, in the 80B MoE model with 49 total layers, only 5 layers employ full attention, yet HySparse achieves substantial performance gains while reducing KV cache storage by nearly 10x.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 HySparse 的新架构，它将全注意力层与稀疏注意力层交错排列，并利用全注意力层的输出指导稀疏注意力层的计算，从而在降低计算量和显存占用的同时提升模型性能。
AI.motivation: 现有稀疏注意力方法存在依赖额外代理预测 token 重要性导致复杂度和性能下降，以及虽然降低计算量但未能节省 KV 缓存的问题。 HySparse 旨在解决这些局限性。
AI.method: HySparse 架构将每个全注意力层与多个稀疏注意力层交错。每个稀疏注意力层的 token 选择和 KV 缓存直接从前一个全注意力层导出。全注意力层充当“神谕”来识别重要 token，并且稀疏注意力层可以重用全注意力层的 KV 缓存。
AI.result: 在 7B 密集模型和 80B MoE 模型上评估 HySparse。结果显示，HySparse 始终优于全注意力模型和 SWA 基线。特别是在 80B MoE 模型中，仅有 5 层采用全注意力，HySparse 实现了显著的性能提升，同时 KV 缓存存储减少了近 10 倍。
AI.conclusion: HySparse 是一种有效的混合注意力架构，通过利用全注意力层的输出来指导稀疏注意力层的计算，成功地降低了计算复杂度和内存占用，同时提升了模型性能，克服了现有稀疏注意力方法的缺点。

title: Feasible strategies for conflict resolution within intuitionistic fuzzy preference-based conflict situations
summary: In three-way conflict analysis, preference-based conflict situations characterize agents' attitudes towards issues by formally modeling their preferences over pairs of issues. However, existing preference-based conflict models rely exclusively on three qualitative relations, namely, preference, converse, and indifference, to describe agents' attitudes towards issue pairs, which significantly limits their capacity in capturing the essence of conflict. To overcome this limitation, we introduce the concept of an intuitionistic fuzzy preference-based conflict situation that captures agents' attitudes towards issue pairs with finer granularity than that afforded by classical preference-based models. Afterwards, we develop intuitionistic fuzzy preference-based conflict measures within this framework, and construct three-way conflict analysis models for trisecting the set of agent pairs, the agent set, and the issue set. Additionally, relative loss functions built on the proposed conflict functions are employed to calculate thresholds for three-way conflict analysis. Finally, we present adjustment mechanism-based feasible strategies that simultaneously account for both adjustment magnitudes and conflict degrees, together with an algorithm for constructing such feasible strategies, and provide an illustrative example to demonstrate the validity and effectiveness of the proposed model.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于直觉模糊偏好的三向冲突分析新框架，通过引入直觉模糊集来更精细地刻画代理人对议题对的态度，并在此基础上开发了冲突度量、冲突分析模型和可调策略，以克服现有模型的局限性。
AI.motivation: 现有基于偏好的三向冲突分析模型仅使用三种定性关系（偏好、反向、无差别）来描述代理人对议题对的态度，这限制了其捕捉冲突本质的能力。需要更精细的工具来刻画代理人的态度。
AI.method: 1. 引入直觉模糊偏好概念，用直觉模糊集更精细地表示代理人对议题对的态度。 2. 在此框架下开发直觉模糊偏好冲突度量。 3. 构建用于三向分割代理人对集合、代理人集合和议题集合的三向冲突分析模型。 4. 利用基于冲突度量的相对损失函数计算三向冲突分析的阈值。 5. 提出基于调整机制的可行策略，同时考虑调整幅度和冲突程度，并提供构造算法。
AI.result: 提出了一种更精细化、更强大的三向冲突分析框架。开发了直觉模糊偏好冲突度量和相应的冲突分析模型。通过相对损失函数确定阈值。设计了考虑调整幅度和冲突程度的可行策略及其算法。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的基于直觉模糊偏好的三向冲突分析框架能够更有效地捕捉代理人对议题的态度，克服了经典模型的局限性。该框架及其开发的度量、模型和策略在处理复杂冲突情境方面具有有效性。

title: ACL: Aligned Contrastive Learning Improves BERT and Multi-exit BERT Fine-tuning
summary: Despite its success in self-supervised learning, contrastive learning is less studied in the supervised setting. In this work, we first use a set of pilot experiments to show that in the supervised setting, the cross-entropy loss objective (CE) and the contrastive learning objective often conflict with each other, thus hindering the applications of CL in supervised settings. To resolve this problem, we introduce a novel \underline{A}ligned \underline{C}ontrastive \underline{L}earning (ACL) framework. First, ACL-Embed regards label embeddings as extra augmented samples with different labels and employs contrastive learning to align the label embeddings with its samples' representations. Second, to facilitate the optimization of ACL-Embed objective combined with the CE loss, we propose ACL-Grad, which will discard the ACL-Embed term if the two objectives are in conflict. To further enhance the performances of intermediate exits of multi-exit BERT, we further propose cross-layer ACL (ACL-CL), which is to ask the teacher exit to guide the optimization of student shallow exits. Extensive experiments on the GLUE benchmark results in the following takeaways: (a) ACL-BRT outperforms or performs comparably with CE and CE+SCL on the GLUE tasks; (b) ACL, especially CL-ACL, significantly surpasses the baseline methods on the fine-tuning of multi-exit BERT, thus providing better quality-speed tradeoffs for low-latency applications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为ACL（Aligned Contrastive Learning）的框架，用于解决监督式对比学习中交叉熵损失与对比学习目标之间的冲突问题，并进一步提出ACL-CL来增强多出口BERT的中间层性能，实验证明ACL-BRT在GLUE基准测试中表现优异，ACL-CL能显著提升多出口BERT的微调性能。
AI.motivation: 在监督学习设置下，对比学习（CL）的交叉熵损失（CE）目标与CL目标之间常存在冲突，阻碍了CL在监督学习中的应用。本文旨在解决这一问题，并提升多出口BERT的中间层性能。
AI.method: 提出了两种方法：1. ACL-Embed，将标签嵌入视为额外增强样本，通过对比学习将其与样本表示对齐。2. ACL-Grad，当CE和ACL-Embed目标冲突时，自动丢弃ACL-Embed项。此外，为了增强多出口BERT的中间层性能，提出了跨层ACL（ACL-CL），让教师出口指导学生浅层出口的优化。
AI.result: 在GLUE基准测试上，ACL-BRT的性能优于或等于CE和CE+SCL。特别是CL-ACL，在多出口BERT的微调上显著优于基线方法，为低延迟应用提供了更好的速度-质量权衡。
AI.conclusion: ACL框架成功解决了监督式对比学习中的目标冲突问题，并显著提升了多出口BERT模型的性能，尤其是在对延迟敏感的应用中，提供了更好的效率和准确性。ACL-CL能够有效地利用教师出口来指导学生出口的学习。

title: A3-TTA: Adaptive Anchor Alignment Test-Time Adaptation for Image Segmentation
comment: Accepted by IEEE Transactions on Image Processing
summary: Test-Time Adaptation (TTA) offers a practical solution for deploying image segmentation models under domain shift without accessing source data or retraining. Among existing TTA strategies, pseudo-label-based methods have shown promising performance. However, they often rely on perturbation-ensemble heuristics (e.g., dropout sampling, test-time augmentation, Gaussian noise), which lack distributional grounding and yield unstable training signals. This can trigger error accumulation and catastrophic forgetting during adaptation. To address this, we propose \textbf{A3-TTA}, a TTA framework that constructs reliable pseudo-labels through anchor-guided supervision. Specifically, we identify well-predicted target domain images using a class compact density metric, under the assumption that confident predictions imply distributional proximity to the source domain. These anchors serve as stable references to guide pseudo-label generation, which is further regularized via semantic consistency and boundary-aware entropy minimization. Additionally, we introduce a self-adaptive exponential moving average strategy to mitigate label noise and stabilize model update during adaptation. Evaluated on both multi-domain medical images (heart structure and prostate segmentation) and natural images, A3-TTA significantly improves average Dice scores by 10.40 to 17.68 percentage points compared to the source model, outperforming several state-of-the-art TTA methods under different segmentation model architectures. A3-TTA also excels in continual TTA, maintaining high performance across sequential target domains with strong anti-forgetting ability. The code will be made publicly available at https://github.com/HiLab-git/A3-TTA.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 A3-TTA 的测试时域自适应框架，通过锚点引导的监督来生成可靠的伪标签，从而提高图像分割模型在领域偏移下的性能，并在医学和自然图像数据集上取得了显著的改进。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于伪标签的测试时域自适应（TTA）方法通常依赖于缺乏分布依据的扰动集成策略，容易导致错误累积和灾难性遗忘。因此，研究需要一种更稳定、更可靠的 TTA 方法。
AI.method: A3-TTA 框架通过以下方式构建可靠的伪标签：1. 识别预测准确的目标域图像（锚点），基于类紧密密度指标；2. 利用这些锚点作为稳定参考来指导伪标签生成；3. 通过语义一致性和边界感知熵最小化来正则化伪标签；4. 引入自适应指数移动平均策略来减轻标签噪声并稳定模型更新。
AI.result: 在多领域医学图像（心脏结构和前列腺分割）和自然图像数据集上，A3-TTA 相较于源模型显著提高了平均 Dice 分数（10.40 至 17.68 个百分点），并优于多种最先进的 TTA 方法。此外，A3-TTA 在持续 TTA 场景下表现出色，能够跨越连续的目标域保持高性能并具备强大的抗遗忘能力。
AI.conclusion: A3-TTA 框架通过锚点引导的监督，成功解决了现有 TTA 方法中伪标签不稳定的问题，有效提升了图像分割模型在领域偏移下的鲁棒性和性能，并展现出在持续学习场景下的潜力。

title: DiscoverLLM: From Executing Intents to Discovering Them
summary: To handle ambiguous and open-ended requests, Large Language Models (LLMs) are increasingly trained to interact with users to surface intents they have not yet expressed (e.g., ask clarification questions). However, users are often ambiguous because they have not yet formed their intents: they must observe and explore outcomes to discover what they want. Simply asking "what kind of tone do you want?" fails when users themselves do not know. We introduce DiscoverLLM, a novel and generalizable framework that trains LLMs to help users form and discover their intents. Central to our approach is a novel user simulator that models cognitive state with a hierarchy of intents that progressively concretize as the model surfaces relevant options -- where the degree of concretization serves as a reward signal that models can be trained to optimize. Resulting models learn to collaborate with users by adaptively diverging (i.e., explore options) when intents are unclear, and converging (i.e., refine and implement) when intents concretize. Across proposed interactive benchmarks in creative writing, technical writing, and SVG drawing, DiscoverLLM achieves over 10% higher task performance while reducing conversation length by up to 40%. In a user study with 75 human participants, DiscoverLLM improved conversation satisfaction and efficiency compared to baselines.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为DiscoverLLM的新框架，旨在解决大型语言模型（LLM）在处理用户模糊、未明确表达的意图时遇到的挑战。该框架通过引入一个用户模拟器，该模拟器能够模拟用户意图的逐步具体化过程，并以意图具体化程度作为奖励信号来训练LLM。实验表明，DiscoverLLM在创意写作、技术写作和SVG绘图等任务上表现更优，并缩短了对话长度，用户研究也证实了其在提高对话满意度和效率方面的有效性。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM在处理用户模糊和未表达的意图时存在困难，因为用户自身可能尚未形成明确意图，需要通过观察和探索来发现。简单地询问模糊问题无法解决此问题。因此，研究的动机是开发一种能够帮助用户形成和发现其意图的LLM训练框架。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种名为DiscoverLLM的新框架。该框架的核心是一个新颖的用户模拟器，它能够模拟用户的认知状态，通过一系列逐步具体化的意图来表示。意图的concretization程度被用作奖励信号，用于训练LLM。训练出的模型能够根据用户意图的清晰度，在需要时探索选项（diverge），在意图明确时进行细化和执行（converge）。
AI.result: 在创意写作、技术写作和SVG绘图的交互式基准测试中，DiscoverLLM实现了超过10%的任务性能提升，同时对话长度减少了高达40%。在一项包含75名人类参与者的用户研究中，与基线模型相比，DiscoverLLM提高了对话满意度和效率。
AI.conclusion: DiscoverLLM是一个新颖且可泛化的框架，能够有效地训练LLM来帮助用户形成和发现他们的意图。该框架通过模拟用户意图的逐步具体化和利用该过程作为奖励信号，实现了更高效和令人满意的用户交互，尤其是在处理模糊和开放式请求时。

title: Full end-to-end diagnostic workflow automation of 3D OCT via foundation model-driven AI for retinal diseases
summary: Optical coherence tomography (OCT) has revolutionized retinal disease diagnosis with its high-resolution and three-dimensional imaging nature, yet its full diagnostic automation in clinical practices remains constrained by multi-stage workflows and conventional single-slice single-task AI models. We present Full-process OCT-based Clinical Utility System (FOCUS), a foundation model-driven framework enabling end-to-end automation of 3D OCT retinal disease diagnosis. FOCUS sequentially performs image quality assessment with EfficientNetV2-S, followed by abnormality detection and multi-disease classification using a fine-tuned Vision Foundation Model. Crucially, FOCUS leverages a unified adaptive aggregation method to intelligently integrate 2D slices-level predictions into comprehensive 3D patient-level diagnosis. Trained and tested on 3,300 patients (40,672 slices), and externally validated on 1,345 patients (18,498 slices) across four different-tier centers and diverse OCT devices, FOCUS achieved high F1 scores for quality assessment (99.01%), abnormally detection (97.46%), and patient-level diagnosis (94.39%). Real-world validation across centers also showed stable performance (F1: 90.22%-95.24%). In human-machine comparisons, FOCUS matched expert performance in abnormality detection (F1: 95.47% vs 90.91%) and multi-disease diagnosis (F1: 93.49% vs 91.35%), while demonstrating better efficiency. FOCUS automates the image-to-diagnosis pipeline, representing a critical advance towards unmanned ophthalmology with a validated blueprint for autonomous screening to enhance population scale retinal care accessibility and efficiency.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为FOCUS的基于3D OCT视网膜疾病诊断的端到端自动化框架，利用基础模型实现了从图像质量评估到多疾病分类的全面自动化，并在大规模数据集和多中心真实世界验证中表现出接近甚至优于专家水平的性能，有望推动眼科无人化发展。
AI.motivation: 当前的OCT诊断流程复杂且依赖于传统的单切片、单任务AI模型，这限制了其在临床实践中的全面自动化诊断能力。研究旨在开发一个能够实现3D OCT视网膜疾病诊断全流程自动化的框架。
AI.method: FOCUS框架采用基础模型驱动，首先使用EfficientNetV2-S进行图像质量评估，然后利用微调的Vision Foundation Model进行异常检测和多疾病分类。关键创新在于采用统一的自适应聚合方法，将2D切片级别的预测整合为3D患者级别的诊断。
AI.result: 在3,300名患者（40,672张切片）的数据集上训练和测试，并在1,345名患者（18,498张切片）的外部验证集上，FOCUS在质量评估（F1: 99.01%）、异常检测（F1: 97.46%）和患者级别诊断（F1: 94.39%）方面取得了高F1分数。在多中心真实世界验证中，性能稳定（F1: 90.22%-95.24%）。与专家相比，FOCUS在异常检测（F1: 95.47% vs 90.91%）和多疾病诊断（F1: 93.49% vs 91.35%）方面表现相当，同时效率更高。
AI.conclusion: FOCUS框架实现了OCT图像到诊断的自动化流程，是实现眼科无人化和提高群体规模视网膜护理可及性与效率的关键一步，为自主筛查提供了经过验证的蓝图。

title: PQTNet: Pixel-wise Quantitative Thermography Neural Network for Estimating Defect Depth in Polylactic Acid Parts by Additive Manufacturing
summary: Defect depth quantification in additively manufactured (AM) components remains a significant challenge for non-destructive testing (NDT). This study proposes a Pixel-wise Quantitative Thermography Neural Network (PQT-Net) to address this challenge for polylactic acid (PLA) parts. A key innovation is a novel data augmentation strategy that reconstructs thermal sequence data into two-dimensional stripe images, preserving the complete temporal evolution of heat diffusion for each pixel. The PQT-Net architecture incorporates a pre-trained EfficientNetV2-S backbone and a custom Residual Regression Head (RRH) with learnable parameters to refine outputs. Comparative experiments demonstrate the superiority of PQT-Net over other deep learning models, achieving a minimum Mean Absolute Error (MAE) of 0.0094 mm and a coefficient of determination (R) exceeding 99%. The high precision of PQT-Net underscores its potential for robust quantitative defect characterization in AM.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 PQT-Net 的像素级定量热成像神经网络，用于精确量化增材制造（AM）聚乳酸（PLA）部件中的缺陷深度，并通过创新的数据增强策略和高效网络架构取得了优异的性能。
AI.motivation: 在无损检测（NDT）中，准确量化增材制造（AM）部件的缺陷深度仍然是一个重大挑战。
AI.method: 研究提出了一种像素级定量热成像神经网络（PQT-Net），并采用一种新颖的数据增强策略，将热序列数据重构为二维条纹图像，以保留每个像素完整的热扩散时间演变。PQT-Net 架构集成了预训练的 EfficientNetV2-S 主干和一个自定义的具有可学习参数的残差回归头（RRH）。
AI.result: PQT-Net 在与其它深度学习模型进行的对比实验中表现出优越性，实现了最低 0.0094 mm 的平均绝对误差（MAE），决定系数（R）超过 99%。
AI.conclusion: PQT-Net 实现了高精度的缺陷深度量化，展示了其在 AM 部件中进行稳健定量缺陷表征的潜力。

title: Ontology-to-tools compilation for executable semantic constraint enforcement in LLM agents
summary: We introduce ontology-to-tools compilation as a proof-of-principle mechanism for coupling large language models (LLMs) with formal domain knowledge. Within The World Avatar (TWA), ontological specifications are compiled into executable tool interfaces that LLM-based agents must use to create and modify knowledge graph instances, enforcing semantic constraints during generation rather than through post-hoc validation. Extending TWA's semantic agent composition framework, the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and associated agents are integral components of the knowledge graph ecosystem, enabling structured interaction between generative models, symbolic constraints, and external resources. An agent-based workflow translates ontologies into ontology-aware tools and iteratively applies them to extract, validate, and repair structured knowledge from unstructured scientific text. Using metal-organic polyhedra synthesis literature as an illustrative case, we show how executable ontological semantics can guide LLM behaviour and reduce manual schema and prompt engineering, establishing a general paradigm for embedding formal knowledge into generative systems.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种将本体论（ontologies）编译成可执行工具（ontology-to-tools compilation）的机制，用于将大型语言模型（LLMs）与形式化的领域知识相结合，并在其知识图谱（knowledge graph）的构建过程中强制执行语义约束。
AI.motivation: 为了解决大型语言模型在生成知识图谱时缺乏形式化领域知识约束的问题，减少手动工程的工作量。
AI.method: 提出并实现了ontology-to-tools compilation机制，将其集成到The World Avatar（TWA）框架中。利用Model Context Protocol（MCP）和相关的Agent来连接生成模型、符号约束和外部资源。构建了一个基于Agent的工作流，将本体论转化为面向本体的工具，并迭代地从非结构化文本中提取、验证和修复结构化知识。
AI.result: 通过使用金属有机多面体合成文献作为案例，证明了可执行的本体论语义能够有效指导LLM的行为，并显著减少了手动进行的模式设计和提示工程。
AI.conclusion: ontology-to-tools compilation是一种通用的范式，可以将形式化知识嵌入到生成式系统中，从而实现LLMs与形式化领域知识的有效耦合，并在知识生成过程中强制执行语义约束。

title: Use Graph When It Needs: Efficiently and Adaptively Integrating Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Graphs
summary: Large language models (LLMs) often struggle with knowledge-intensive tasks due to hallucinations and outdated parametric knowledge. While Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) addresses this by integrating external corpora, its effectiveness is limited by fragmented information in unstructured domain documents. Graph-augmented RAG (GraphRAG) emerged to enhance contextual reasoning through structured knowledge graphs, yet paradoxically underperforms vanilla RAG in real-world scenarios, exhibiting significant accuracy drops and prohibitive latency despite gains on complex queries. We identify the rigid application of GraphRAG to all queries, regardless of complexity, as the root cause. To resolve this, we propose an efficient and adaptive GraphRAG framework called EA-GraphRAG that dynamically integrates RAG and GraphRAG paradigms through syntax-aware complexity analysis. Our approach introduces: (i) a syntactic feature constructor that parses each query and extracts a set of structural features; (ii) a lightweight complexity scorer that maps these features to a continuous complexity score; and (iii) a score-driven routing policy that selects dense RAG for low-score queries, invokes graph-based retrieval for high-score queries, and applies complexity-aware reciprocal rank fusion to handle borderline cases. Extensive experiments on a comprehensive benchmark, consisting of two single-hop and two multi-hop QA benchmarks, demonstrate that our EA-GraphRAG significantly improves accuracy, reduces latency, and achieves state-of-the-art performance in handling mixed scenarios involving both simple and complex queries.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为EA-GraphRAG的自适应框架，通过语法分析动态选择使用纯检索增强生成（RAG）还是图增强RAG（GraphRAG），以解决GraphRAG在处理简单查询时效率低下和延迟高的问题，并在多项QA基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的GraphRAG方法在处理复杂查询时能提升性能，但在处理简单查询时效率低下且延迟高，导致在混合查询场景下整体表现不如纯RAG。本文旨在解决GraphRAG在不同查询复杂度下表现不一致的问题。
AI.method: EA-GraphRAG通过以下三个步骤动态集成RAG和GraphRAG：1. 语法特征构造器：解析查询并提取结构化特征。2. 轻量级复杂度评分器：根据特征计算查询的复杂度得分。3. 得分驱动的路由策略：对低复杂度查询使用密集RAG，对高复杂度查询使用基于图的检索，对中间情况使用复杂度感知互惠排名融合。
AI.result: EA-GraphRAG在包括单跳和多跳QA的基准测试中，显著提高了准确性，降低了延迟，并在处理混合简单和复杂查询的场景中达到了最先进的性能。
AI.conclusion: EA-GraphRAG通过自适应地整合RAG和GraphRAG，有效解决了GraphRAG在处理不同复杂度查询时的效率和延迟问题，并在实际应用中展现出优越的性能。

title: The Dual Role of Abstracting over the Irrelevant in Symbolic Explanations: Cognitive Effort vs. Understanding
summary: Explanations are central to human cognition, yet AI systems often produce outputs that are difficult to understand. While symbolic AI offers a transparent foundation for interpretability, raw logical traces often impose a high extraneous cognitive load. We investigate how formal abstractions, specifically removal and clustering, impact human reasoning performance and cognitive effort. Utilizing Answer Set Programming (ASP) as a formal framework, we define a notion of irrelevant details to be abstracted over to obtain simplified explanations. Our cognitive experiments, in which participants classified stimuli across domains with explanations derived from an answer set program, show that clustering details significantly improve participants' understanding, while removal of details significantly reduce cognitive effort, supporting the hypothesis that abstraction enhances human-centered symbolic explanations.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，通过聚类和移除细节对逻辑推理过程进行抽象，可以显著提升AI解释的可理解性和降低认知负荷。
AI.motivation: 当前AI系统生成的解释难以理解，而传统的符号AI虽然透明但会增加认知负荷。研究旨在探索形式抽象（移除和聚类）如何影响人类的推理表现和认知努力，以改进以人为中心的符号化解释。
AI.method: 使用Answer Set Programming (ASP) 作为形式框架，定义了“无关细节”并进行抽象。通过认知实验，让参与者在ASP程序生成的解释下对刺激进行分类，并测量理解程度和认知努力。
AI.result: 实验结果显示，聚类细节显著提高了参与者的理解能力，而移除细节显著降低了认知努力。
AI.conclusion: 形式抽象，特别是聚类和移除细节，能够有效地增强以人为中心的符号化AI解释，提升人类的理解能力并降低认知负荷。

title: Invisible Clean-Label Backdoor Attacks for Generative Data Augmentation
summary: With the rapid advancement of image generative models, generative data augmentation has become an effective way to enrich training images, especially when only small-scale datasets are available. At the same time, in practical applications, generative data augmentation can be vulnerable to clean-label backdoor attacks, which aim to bypass human inspection. However, based on theoretical analysis and preliminary experiments, we observe that directly applying existing pixel-level clean-label backdoor attack methods (e.g., COMBAT) to generated images results in low attack success rates. This motivates us to move beyond pixel-level triggers and focus instead on the latent feature level. To this end, we propose InvLBA, an invisible clean-label backdoor attack method for generative data augmentation by latent perturbation. We theoretically prove that the generalization of the clean accuracy and attack success rates of InvLBA can be guaranteed. Experiments on multiple datasets show that our method improves the attack success rate by 46.43% on average, with almost no reduction in clean accuracy and high robustness against SOTA defense methods.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为InvLBA的隐形、标签干净的后门攻击方法，通过在潜在特征层面进行扰动，用于生成式数据增强，有效解决了现有像素级攻击方法在生成图像上的低成功率问题。
AI.motivation: 生成式数据增强在小规模数据集场景下有效，但易受隐形、标签干净的后门攻击。现有像素级攻击方法在生成图像上成功率低，因此需要新的攻击策略。
AI.method: InvLBA方法通过对生成模型潜在特征进行扰动来实现隐形、标签干净的后门攻击，而不是直接操作像素。该方法在理论上证明了其泛化能力。
AI.result: InvLBA方法平均将攻击成功率提高了46.43%，同时对干净准确率几乎没有影响，并对现有最先进的防御方法表现出高鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: InvLBA是一种有效且隐蔽的后门攻击方法，适用于生成式数据增强场景，能够克服像素级攻击的局限性，并具有良好的攻击效果和防御鲁棒性。

title: $V_0$: A Generalist Value Model for Any Policy at State Zero
summary: Policy gradient methods rely on a baseline to measure the relative advantage of an action, ensuring the model reinforces behaviors that outperform its current average capability. In the training of Large Language Models (LLMs) using Actor-Critic methods (e.g., PPO), this baseline is typically estimated by a Value Model (Critic) often as large as the policy model itself. However, as the policy continuously evolves, the value model requires expensive, synchronous incremental training to accurately track the shifting capabilities of the policy. To avoid this overhead, Group Relative Policy Optimization (GRPO) eliminates the coupled value model by using the average reward of a group of rollouts as the baseline; yet, this approach necessitates extensive sampling to maintain estimation stability. In this paper, we propose $V_0$, a Generalist Value Model capable of estimating the expected performance of any model on unseen prompts without requiring parameter updates. We reframe value estimation by treating the policy's dynamic capability as an explicit context input; specifically, we leverage a history of instruction-performance pairs to dynamically profile the model, departing from the traditional paradigm that relies on parameter fitting to perceive capability shifts. Focusing on value estimation at State Zero (i.e., the initial prompt, hence $V_0$), our model serves as a critical resource scheduler. During GRPO training, $V_0$ predicts success rates prior to rollout, allowing for efficient sampling budget allocation; during deployment, it functions as a router, dispatching instructions to the most cost-effective and suitable model. Empirical results demonstrate that $V_0$ significantly outperforms heuristic budget allocation and achieves a Pareto-optimal trade-off between performance and cost in LLM routing tasks.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 $V_0$ 的通用价值模型，它可以估计任何模型在未见过提示上的预期性能，而无需参数更新。该模型通过将策略的动态能力视为显式上下文输入，利用指令-性能对的历史来动态分析模型，从而摆脱了依赖参数拟合来感知能力变化的传统范式。在 GRPO 训练中，$V_0$ 可以在 rollout 前预测成功率，用于高效的采样预算分配；在部署中，它可以作为路由器，将指令分发给成本效益最高且最合适的模型。
AI.motivation: 传统的 Actor-Critic 方法（如 PPO）在训练 LLM 时，需要一个与策略模型大小相当的价值模型（Critic）来估计基线。然而，随着策略的不断演进，价值模型需要昂贵的同步增量训练来跟踪策略能力的变化。GRPO 虽消除了耦合的价值模型，但需要大量的采样来维持估计的稳定性。因此，研究者希望找到一种更高效的价值估计方法，以降低训练和部署 LLM 的成本。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为 $V_0$ 的通用价值模型，它不需要参数更新。该模型将策略的动态能力作为显式上下文输入，并利用历史的指令-性能对来动态分析模型。在 GRPO 训练中，$V_0$ 用于预测 rollout 前的成功率，以指导采样预算的分配。在部署阶段，$V_0$ 可作为路由器，将指令分配给最合适的模型。
AI.result: $V_0$ 模型在 LLM 训练和部署方面均取得了显著效果。在训练方面，它通过更有效的采样预算分配，提高了训练效率。在部署方面，它在性能和成本之间实现了帕累托最优的权衡，显著优于启发式预算分配方法。
AI.conclusion: $V_0$ 模型是一种创新的价值估计方法，它能够无需参数更新地动态评估 LLM 的性能。该模型在提高 LLM 训练效率和优化部署策略方面具有重要应用价值，尤其是在资源受限或需要快速响应的场景下。

title: IntentRL: Training Proactive User-intent Agents for Open-ended Deep Research via Reinforcement Learning
summary: Deep Research (DR) agents extend Large Language Models (LLMs) beyond parametric knowledge by autonomously retrieving and synthesizing evidence from large web corpora into long-form reports, enabling a long-horizon agentic paradigm. However, unlike real-time conversational assistants, DR is computationally expensive and time-consuming, creating an autonomy-interaction dilemma: high autonomy on ambiguous user queries often leads to prolonged execution with unsatisfactory outcomes. To address this, we propose IntentRL, a framework that trains proactive agents to clarify latent user intents before starting long-horizon research. To overcome the scarcity of open-ended research data, we introduce a scalable pipeline that expands a few seed samples into high-quality dialogue turns via a shallow-to-deep intent refinement graph. We further adopt a two-stage reinforcement learning (RL) strategy: Stage I applies RL on offline dialogues to efficiently learn general user-interaction behavior, while Stage II uses the trained agent and a user simulator for online rollouts to strengthen adaptation to diverse user feedback. Extensive experiments show that IntentRL significantly improves both intent hit rate and downstream task performance, outperforming the built-in clarify modules of closed-source DR agents and proactive LLM baselines.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了IntentRL框架，通过在进行深度研究（DR）之前主动澄清用户意图，解决DR的计算成本高和耗时问题，从而缓解了自主性与交互性之间的两难困境。
AI.motivation: 深度研究（DR）代理虽然能扩展LLM的知识，但计算成本高昂且耗时，尤其是在面对模糊的用户查询时，高自主性往往导致长时间执行和不满意结果。因此，研究的动机是找到一种方法，在DR开始前主动澄清用户意图。
AI.method: IntentRL框架通过以下方式运作：1. 提出一个可扩展的流水线，利用少量种子样本通过浅层到深层的意图细化图生成高质量的对话轮次，以克服开放式研究数据的稀缺性。2. 采用两阶段强化学习（RL）策略：第一阶段在离线对话上应用RL，学习一般的用户交互行为；第二阶段使用训练好的代理和用户模拟器进行在线试运行，以增强对不同用户反馈的适应性。
AI.result: IntentRL显著提高了意图命中率和下游任务性能，并且优于闭源DR代理的内置澄清模块以及其他主动LLM基线。
AI.conclusion: IntentRL框架能够有效训练主动代理，在进行耗时的深度研究之前主动澄清用户意图，从而提升了用户交互和最终任务的性能。

title: MedSAM-Agent: Empowering Interactive Medical Image Segmentation with Multi-turn Agentic Reinforcement Learning
summary: Medical image segmentation is evolving from task-specific models toward generalizable frameworks. Recent research leverages Multi-modal Large Language Models (MLLMs) as autonomous agents, employing reinforcement learning with verifiable reward (RLVR) to orchestrate specialized tools like the Segment Anything Model (SAM). However, these approaches often rely on single-turn, rigid interaction strategies and lack process-level supervision during training, which hinders their ability to fully exploit the dynamic potential of interactive tools and leads to redundant actions. To bridge this gap, we propose MedSAM-Agent, a framework that reformulates interactive segmentation as a multi-step autonomous decision-making process. First, we introduce a hybrid prompting strategy for expert-curated trajectory generation, enabling the model to internalize human-like decision heuristics and adaptive refinement strategies. Furthermore, we develop a two-stage training pipeline that integrates multi-turn, end-to-end outcome verification with a clinical-fidelity process reward design to promote interaction parsimony and decision efficiency. Extensive experiments across 6 medical modalities and 21 datasets demonstrate that MedSAM-Agent achieves state-of-the-art performance, effectively unifying autonomous medical reasoning with robust, iterative optimization. Code is available \href{https://github.com/CUHK-AIM-Group/MedSAM-Agent}{here}.

AI.tldr: MedSAM-Agent 提出了一种新的框架，通过多步决策过程来改进医学图像的交互式分割，并设计了混合提示策略和两阶段训练流程，以提高效率和临床准确性。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在交互式分割时存在单轮、僵化的交互策略，并且缺乏训练过程中的过程监督，导致无法充分发挥交互式工具的动态潜力并产生冗余操作。
AI.method: 提出 MedSAM-Agent 框架，将交互式分割重塑为多步自主决策过程。首先，引入混合提示策略以生成专家策展的轨迹，使模型能够内化类人启发式决策和自适应精炼策略。其次，开发了一个两阶段训练流程，集成了多轮、端到端的成果验证和临床保真过程奖励设计。
AI.result: 在 6 种医学模态和 21 个数据集上进行了广泛的实验，MedSAM-Agent 取得了最先进的性能，有效地统一了自主医学推理和鲁棒的迭代优化。
AI.conclusion: MedSAM-Agent 成功地将自主医学推理与鲁棒的迭代优化相结合，为医学图像的交互式分割提供了一种更高效、更准确的方法。

title: CL-bench: A Benchmark for Context Learning
summary: Current language models (LMs) excel at reasoning over prompts using pre-trained knowledge. However, real-world tasks are far more complex and context-dependent: models must learn from task-specific context and leverage new knowledge beyond what is learned during pre-training to reason and resolve tasks. We term this capability context learning, a crucial ability that humans naturally possess but has been largely overlooked. To this end, we introduce CL-bench, a real-world benchmark consisting of 500 complex contexts, 1,899 tasks, and 31,607 verification rubrics, all crafted by experienced domain experts. Each task is designed such that the new content required to resolve it is contained within the corresponding context. Resolving tasks in CL-bench requires models to learn from the context, ranging from new domain-specific knowledge, rule systems, and complex procedures to laws derived from empirical data, all of which are absent from pre-training. This goes far beyond long-context tasks that primarily test retrieval or reading comprehension, and in-context learning tasks, where models learn simple task patterns via instructions and demonstrations. Our evaluations of ten frontier LMs find that models solve only 17.2% of tasks on average. Even the best-performing model, GPT-5.1, solves only 23.7%, revealing that LMs have yet to achieve effective context learning, which poses a critical bottleneck for tackling real-world, complex context-dependent tasks. CL-bench represents a step towards building LMs with this fundamental capability, making them more intelligent and advancing their deployment in real-world scenarios.

AI.tldr: 研究提出了CL-bench基准，用于评估语言模型在复杂、特定任务场景下学习和运用新知识（上下文学习）的能力。现有模型在这一基准上的表现不佳，表明上下文学习是当前语言模型面临的关键瓶颈。
AI.motivation: 现实世界的任务比预训练语言模型擅长处理的更复杂、更依赖上下文，需要模型从特定任务的上下文和预训练之外的新知识中学习，而现有研究忽视了这种“上下文学习”能力。
AI.method: 创建了CL-bench基准，包含500个复杂上下文、1899个任务和31607个验证标准，由领域专家设计。任务要求模型从上下文学习新知识（领域知识、规则系统、复杂流程、数据驱动的法则等），这些知识在预训练中不存在。
AI.result: 在CL-bench基准上，10个前沿语言模型的平均任务解决率仅为17.2%，最佳模型GPT-5.1也仅为23.7%。这表明当前语言模型在上下文学习方面表现不佳。
AI.conclusion: 上下文学习是语言模型在现实世界复杂任务中面临的关键瓶颈。CL-bench基准是衡量和推动语言模型实现这一能力的重要工具，有助于提升模型的智能水平和实际应用能力。

title: Efficient Algorithms for Partial Constraint Satisfaction Problems over Control-flow Graphs
comment: Already accepted by SETTA'25. https://www.setta2025.uk/accepted-papers. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2507.16660
summary: In this work, we focus on the Partial Constraint Satisfaction Problem (PCSP) over control-flow graphs (CFGs) of programs. PCSP serves as a generalization of the well-known Constraint Satisfaction Problem (CSP). In the CSP framework, we define a set of variables, a set of constraints, and a finite domain $D$ that encompasses all possible values for each variable. The objective is to assign a value to each variable in such a way that all constraints are satisfied. In the graph variant of CSP, an underlying graph is considered and we have one variable corresponding to each vertex of the graph and one or several constraints corresponding to each edge. In PCSPs, we allow for certain constraints to be violated at a specified cost, aiming to find a solution that minimizes the total cost. Numerous classical compiler optimization tasks can be framed as PCSPs over control-flow graphs. Examples include Register Allocation, Lifetime-optimal Speculative Partial Redundancy Elimination (LOSPRE), and Optimal Placement of Bank Selection Instructions. On the other hand, it is well-known that control-flow graphs of structured programs are sparse and decomposable in a variety of ways. In this work, we rely on the Series-Parallel-Loop (SPL) decompositions as introduced by~\cite{RegisterAllocation}. Our main contribution is a general algorithm for PCSPs over SPL graphs with a time complexity of \(O(|G| \cdot |D|^6)\), where \(|G|\) represents the size of the control-flow graph. Note that for any fixed domain $D,$ this yields a linear-time solution. Our algorithm can be seen as a generalization and unification of previous SPL-based approaches for register allocation and LOSPRE. In addition, we provide experimental results over another classical PCSP task, i.e. Optimal Bank Selection, achieving runtimes four times better than the previous state of the art.

title: When Routing Collapses: On the Degenerate Convergence of LLM Routers
summary: LLM routing aims to achieve a favorable quality--cost trade-off by dynamically assigning easy queries to smaller models and harder queries to stronger ones. However, across both unimodal and multimodal settings, we uncover a pervasive yet underexplored failure mode in existing routers: as the user's cost budget increases, routers systematically default to the most capable and most expensive model even when cheaper models already suffice. As a result, current routers under-utilize small models, wasting computation and monetary cost and undermining the core promise of routing; we term this phenomenon routing collapse. We attribute routing collapse to an objective--decision mismatch: many routers are trained to predict scalar performance scores, whereas routing decisions ultimately depend on discrete comparisons among candidate models. Consequently, small prediction errors can flip relative orderings and trigger suboptimal selections. To bridge this gap, we propose EquiRouter, a decision-aware router that directly learns model rankings, restoring the role of smaller models and mitigating routing collapse. On RouterBench, EquiRouter reduces cost by about 17\% at GPT-4-level performance compared to the strongest prior router. Our code is available at https://github.com/AIGNLAI/EquiRouter.

AI.tldr: 研究发现现有的大语言模型（LLM）路由器存在“路由崩溃”问题，即随着成本预算增加，路由器倾向于选择最强大但最昂贵的模型，即使较便宜的模型已足够。为此，提出了一种名为EquiRouter的决策感知型路由器，该模型直接学习模型排名，有效缓解了路由崩溃，并在RouterBench上实现了约17%的成本节约。
AI.motivation: 现有LLM路由器的成本效益权衡不佳，当成本预算增加时，路由器会倾向于选择最昂贵的模型，即使便宜的模型已经足够，导致计算和成本浪费，这被称为“路由崩溃”。
AI.method: 提出EquiRouter，一种决策感知型路由器，它不预测标量性能分数，而是直接学习模型之间的排名，以解决目标-决策不匹配问题，从而减少路由崩溃。
AI.result: EquiRouter在RouterBench上，与最先进的路由器相比，在达到GPT-4级别的性能时，成本降低了约17%。
AI.conclusion: EquiRouter通过直接学习模型排名，有效解决了现有LLM路由器中的“路由崩溃”现象，并在成本效益方面取得了显著提升，恢复了小型模型的使用价值。

title: Controlling Output Rankings in Generative Engines for LLM-based Search
summary:
The way customers search for and choose products is changing with the rise of large language models (LLMs). LLM-based search, or generative engines, provides direct product recommendations to users, rather than traditional online search results that require users to explore options themselves. However, these recommendations are strongly influenced by the initial retrieval order of LLMs, which disadvantages small businesses and independent creators by limiting their visibility.
  In this work, we propose CORE, an optimization method that \textbf{C}ontrols \textbf{O}utput \textbf{R}ankings in g\textbf{E}nerative Engines for LLM-based search. Since the LLM's interactions with the search engine are black-box, CORE targets the content returned by search engines as the primary means of influencing output rankings. Specifically, CORE optimizes retrieved content by appending strategically designed optimization content to steer the ranking of outputs. We introduce three types of optimization content: string-based, reasoning-based, and review-based, demonstrating their effectiveness in shaping output rankings. To evaluate CORE in realistic settings, we introduce ProductBench, a large-scale benchmark with 15 product categories and 200 products per category, where each product is associated with its top-10 recommendations collected from Amazon's search interface.
  Extensive experiments on four LLMs with search capabilities (GPT-4o, Gemini-2.5, Claude-4, and Grok-3) demonstrate that CORE achieves an average Promotion Success Rate of \textbf{91.4\% @Top-5}, \textbf{86.6\% @Top-3}, and \textbf{80.3\% @Top-1}, across 15 product categories, outperforming existing ranking manipulation methods while preserving the fluency of optimized content.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为CORE的优化方法，通过修改LLM搜索到的内容来控制生成式引擎的输出排名，以解决LLM搜索中排名偏见的问题。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的搜索（生成式引擎）直接提供产品推荐，但其排名顺序受到LLM检索顺序的影响，可能导致小企业和独立创作者曝光不足。
AI.method: CORE通过向LLM检索到的内容中添加优化内容（包括字符串、推理和评论类型）来操纵输出排名。同时，引入了一个名为ProductBench的大规模基准数据集来评估该方法。
AI.result: 在四种LLM（GPT-4o, Gemini-2.5, Claude-4, Grok-3）上的实验表明，CORE在15个产品类别中平均取得了91.4%@Top-5, 86.6%@Top-3, 和 80.3%@Top-1的推广成功率，优于现有方法且不影响输出内容的流畅性。
AI.conclusion: CORE是一种有效控制LLM生成式引擎输出排名的优化方法，能够提升目标内容的可见性，并为解决LLM搜索中的排名偏见问题提供了一种新途径。

title: PWAVEP: Purifying Imperceptible Adversarial Perturbations in 3D Point Clouds via Spectral Graph Wavelets
summary: Recent progress in adversarial attacks on 3D point clouds, particularly in achieving spatial imperceptibility and high attack performance, presents significant challenges for defenders. Current defensive approaches remain cumbersome, often requiring invasive model modifications, expensive training procedures or auxiliary data access. To address these threats, in this paper, we propose a plug-and-play and non-invasive defense mechanism in the spectral domain, grounded in a theoretical and empirical analysis of the relationship between imperceptible perturbations and high-frequency spectral components. Building upon these insights, we introduce a novel purification framework, termed PWAVEP, which begins by computing a spectral graph wavelet domain saliency score and local sparsity score for each point. Guided by these values, PWAVEP adopts a hierarchical strategy, it eliminates the most salient points, which are identified as hardly recoverable adversarial outliers. Simultaneously, it applies a spectral filtering process to a broader set of moderately salient points. This process leverages a graph wavelet transform to attenuate high-frequency coefficients associated with the targeted points, thereby effectively suppressing adversarial noise. Extensive evaluations demonstrate that the proposed PWAVEP achieves superior accuracy and robustness compared to existing approaches, advancing the state-of-the-art in 3D point cloud purification. Code and datasets are available at https://github.com/a772316182/pwavep

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为PWAVEP的即插即用、非侵入式3D点云防御机制，通过分析扰动与高频光谱分量的关系，利用谱图小波变换和局部稀疏性识别并去除对抗性扰动。
AI.motivation: 现有的对抗性攻击对3D点云的防御机制存在侵入性强、训练成本高、需要额外数据等问题，亟需一种更便捷有效的防御方法。
AI.method: PWAVEP计算每个点的光谱图小波域显著性得分和局部稀疏性得分，然后采用分层策略：首先去除最显著的点（被识别为难以恢复的对抗性异常点），然后对中度显著的点应用谱过滤过程，利用图小波变换衰减与目标点相关的高频系数，从而抑制对抗性噪声。
AI.result: PWAVEP在准确性和鲁棒性方面优于现有方法，达到了3D点云净化技术的最先进水平。
AI.conclusion: PWAVEP是一种有效的、非侵入式的3D点云对抗性防御方法，通过在谱域进行分析和处理，能够有效去除对抗性扰动，提升模型的鲁棒性。

title: Group Selection as a Safeguard Against AI Substitution
summary: Reliance on generative AI can reduce cultural variance and diversity, especially in creative work. This reduction in variance has already led to problems in model performance, including model collapse and hallucination. In this paper, we examine the long-term consequences of AI use for human cultural evolution and the conditions under which widespread AI use may lead to "cultural collapse", a process in which reliance on AI-generated content reduces human variation and innovation and slows cumulative cultural evolution. Using an agent-based model and evolutionary game theory, we compare two types of AI use: complement and substitute. AI-complement users seek suggestions and guidance while remaining the main producers of the final output, whereas AI-substitute users provide minimal input, and rely on AI to produce most of the output. We then study how these use strategies compete and spread under evolutionary dynamics. We find that AI-substitute users prevail under individual-level selection despite the stronger reduction in cultural variance. By contrast, AI-complement users can benefit their groups by maintaining the variance needed for exploration, and can therefore be favored under cultural group selection when group boundaries are strong. Overall, our findings shed light on the long-term, population-level effects of AI adoption and inform policy and organizational strategies to mitigate these risks.

AI.tldr: 本文使用基于智能体的模型和进化博弈论，研究了广泛使用生成式人工智能（AI）对人类文化演进的长期影响，特别是可能导致的“文化崩溃”。研究发现，AI替代性使用者（AI-substitute users）在个体层面选择下占优，尽管他们会更大程度地减少文化变异。而AI互补性使用者（AI-complement users）通过维持探索所需的变异，在群体选择下可能更有益于群体。
AI.motivation: 生成式AI的广泛使用可能导致文化变异和多样性的减少，进而引发模型性能问题（如模型崩溃和幻觉），并可能对人类文化演进产生负面影响，甚至导致“文化崩溃”。
AI.method: 使用基于智能体的模型（agent-based model）和进化博弈论（evolutionary game theory）来比较两种AI使用策略：AI互补（AI-complement）和AI替代（AI-substitute）。研究了这些策略在进化动力学下的竞争和传播。
AI.result: 在个体层面选择下，AI替代性使用者更有可能胜出，尽管这会带来更强的文化变异减少。而在群体选择下，如果群体边界足够强，AI互补性使用者则可能因维持文化变异和探索而对群体有利。
AI.conclusion: AI替代性使用策略在个体层面具有优势，但可能加速文化变异的减少。AI互补性使用策略在群体层面具有潜在优势，能够维持文化多样性。研究结果为理解AI普及的长期影响提供了见解，并为制定缓解AI风险的政策和组织策略提供了依据。

title: Learning Query-Specific Rubrics from Human Preferences for DeepResearch Report Generation
summary: Nowadays, training and evaluating DeepResearch-generated reports remain challenging due to the lack of verifiable reward signals. Accordingly, rubric-based evaluation has become a common practice. However, existing approaches either rely on coarse, pre-defined rubrics that lack sufficient granularity, or depend on manually constructed query-specific rubrics that are costly and difficult to scale. In this paper, we propose a pipeline to train human-preference-aligned query-specific rubric generators tailored for DeepResearch report generation. We first construct a dataset of DeepResearch-style queries annotated with human preferences over paired reports, and train rubric generators via reinforcement learning with a hybrid reward combining human preference supervision and LLM-based rubric evaluation. To better handle long-horizon reasoning, we further introduce a Multi-agent Markov-state (MaMs) workflow for report generation.
